mean_cn: adj.性急的，易怒的，爱闹气的
mean_en: having or showing the attitude of people who become angry and annoyed when they do not get what they want
sentence: My daughter\u0027s acting really petulant just because I wouldn\u0027t allow her to play outdoors.
sentence_trans: 我女儿表现得很任性，就因为我不让她到户外去玩。
word_etyma: pet追寻，寻求 ＋ ulant多…的 → petulant追求太多，导致脾气不好
